cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 5 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Like your own space but still want to mix and mingle with other travellers? Book a spot in our 6 bed mixed dorm.

This is a bed in a room with 5 other guests. Beds come with full linen while towels are available for a small charge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Travelling in a couple or donâ€™t mind sharing with a friend? Our private double rooms are perfect for those who like their own space.

Linen and towels are provided and guests have access to a bathroom which may be shared by up to 2 other rooms.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our cabins are nestled into our quiet garden. Perfect for couples or singles who like their own space, each cabin has a queen bed and a porch to watch the world go by from.

privates.labelDescription: Are you a small group or little family of outdoor explorers? Well, this is our private room with one four single bed all with linen, blankets. Youâ€™ll have a private bathroom and access to all common areas including a kitchen, lounge and movie room.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 2nd Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 2nd Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
